description: This Java class, NoteMapper, provides static utility methods for converting between Note entities and their Data Transfer Object (DTO) representations, specifically NoteRequest and NoteResponse. It facilitates mapping from requests to entities and vice versa, and updating existing entities with request data.

classes.name: NoteMapper
classes.description: A utility class providing static methods for converting between Note entities and their DTOs.

methods.name: toEntity
methods.description: Converts a NoteRequest DTO to a new Note entity, excluding the ID.

methods.name: updateEntity
methods.description: Updates an existing Note entity with data from a NoteRequest DTO.

methods.name: toResponse
methods.description: Converts a Note entity into a NoteResponse DTO for client responses.
